metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19010 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Eval injection in the Math plugin of Limnoria (before 2019.11.09) and Supybot (through 2018-05-09) allows remote unprivileged attackers to disclose information or possibly have unspecified other impact via the calc and icalc IRC commands.

criterions.comment: limnoria package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2019.11.09-2').
